DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of the study was to investigate the changes on heart rate variability, exercise capacity, activities of daily living, and quality of life after aerobic exercise training in cardiac transplant recipients.
DOC.brief_title: Study on Heart Rate Variability in Cardiac Transplant Recipients With Exercise and After Exercise Training
DOC.criteria: Heart transplant recipients with stable post operation condition Age between 2070 years No acute or severe chronic rejection Any condition that might affect exercise performance
